meanings.definition: In a manner relating to the measurement of the depth of bodies of water.
meanings.sent1: She dived bathymetrically to explore the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The submarine descended bathymetrically into the abyss.
meanings.sent3: The fish swam bathymetrically, trying to impress the other sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts delved bathymetrically into the mysteries of the deep sea.
meanings.sent5: The echo sounded bathymetrically, revealing the underwater canyon's depth.

meanings.definition: Using bathymetric methods to study underwater topography.
meanings.sent1: The bathymetrically mapped charts guided the ship safely through the sea.
meanings.sent2: Scientists conducted a bathymetrically survey to map the ocean floor.
meanings.sent3: The bathymetrically inclined researcher always had a depth finder handy.
meanings.sent4: The bathymetrically skilled team discovered a hidden underwater mountain.
meanings.sent5: The bathymetrically detailed map revealed the intricate underwater landscape.
